name: Balanced Mausser Particle Streamer
raw:
<font color=#009B00>

This Instruction Manual will teach you how to assemble a:
  'Balanced Mausser Particle Streamer'
 The Construction kit. must be between Quality Level 121 and 140.
 All other pieces must be of AT LEAST that level range... 
 Add them using shift+right-click.
 Add the pieces in the following order:
 
  1. Submachinegun Weapons Construction kit.
 
  2. Ultra-Long Composite Barrel. . SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt: 514-595
 
  3. Triple Pulse Enabler. . SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt: 514-595
 
  4. Nano Pylon. . SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi: 302-350
 
  5. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 2x Layer. . SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra: 242-280
 
  6. Notum Alloy Strengthened Ribs. . SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi: 302-350
 
  7. Notum Alloy Strengthened Ribs. . SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi: 302-350
 
  8. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 1x Layer. . SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra: 182-210
 
  9. Lock and Stock. . SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt: 484-560
 
  10. Explosion Propulsion Containment Chamber. . SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi: 424-490
 
  11. Auto Targeting Computer -IIR 1. . SkillTo Assemble: Elec. Engi: 272-315
 
  12. Nano Pylon. . SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi: 302-350
